name: M6SegmentedControl
summary: A drop-in replacement for UISegmentedControl mimicking the style of the one in Google Currents and various other Google products.
description: Frok from [HMSegmentedControl](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/HMSegmentedControl), fix the bug of HMSegmentedControl, and add round corner indicator function.
